alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 5:45PM MST until August 13 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 745 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 541 PM MST, A trained weather spotter reported that heavy rain earlier this afternoon has caused the Oro Blanco Reservoir southwest of Arivaca to spill over, and is like resulting in minor flooding issues that will impact Ruby Road at the Oro Blanco Wash about 7 miles south of Arivaca. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arivaca and Arivaca Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
